Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we understand its worth extends far beyond monetary terms to you. We are offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exceptional offer reflects our commitment to making such unparalleled quality accessible to discerning individuals like yourself. We believe that by accepting this offer, you will not only acquire an invaluable asset but also become part of a distinguished community of users who appreciate the true essence of our product. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of welcoming you as our esteemed client. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
